trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Sedona

divs: Sighting DetailsThis was taken at Boynton Canyon twisted tree monument, Sedona,AZ.It is about 3 ft. in diameter. The camera is a 12 megapixal canon. It was not seen with the naked eye, it was on the camera picture file when she checked to see if the picture came out that she snapped of a distant peak. I sent you the picture on your other e-mail, because I couldn't make the brouse accept the file.
Summary: Round blue sphere with port hole windows.
